import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-form', templateUrl: './form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./form.component.css'] }) export class FormComponent { iteration = 0; continue() { this.iteration++; } return() { this.iteration--; } }

Welcome to ISI fitness !

Let's personalize your fitness plan together according to your goals.

What is your name ?

We are happy to have you among us. Let’s get to know you better.
